entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as looking at a ragged old bit of parchment and reacting to George's actions.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as taking out his wand, touching the parchment, and saying 'I solemnly swear that I am up to no good'.

entities.name: messrs moony
entities.description: Messrs. Moony is mentioned as one of the purveyors of aids to magical mischief-makers, along with Wormtail, Padfoot, and Prongs.

entities.name: wormtail
entities.description: Wormtail is mentioned as one of the purveyors of aids to magical mischief-makers, along with Moony, Padfoot, and Prongs.

entities.name: padfoot
entities.description: Padfoot is mentioned as one of the purveyors of aids to magical mischief-makers, along with Moony, Wormtail, and Prongs.

entities.name: prongs
entities.description: Prongs is mentioned as one of the purveyors of aids to magical mischief-makers, along with Moony, Wormtail, and Padfoot.

entities.name: professor dumbledore
entities.description: Professor Dumbledore is mentioned as pacing his study, shown on the Marauder's Map.

entities.name: mrs. fawkes' cat
entities.description: Mrs. Fawkes' cat is mentioned as being labeled on the Marauder's Map, but its name is not specified.

relationships.description: Harry and George are interacting with each other, as shown by their conversation and actions.
Messrs. Moony and Wormtail are partners in the business of providing aids to magical mischief-makers, as mentioned on the Marauder's Map.
Messrs. Moony and Padfoot are partners in the business of providing aids to magical mischief-makers, as mentioned on the Marauder's Map.
Messrs. Moony and Prongs are partners in the business of providing aids to magical mischief-makers, as mentioned on the Marauder's Map.
Professor Dumbledore is visible on the Marauder's Map, which Harry is looking at.
